actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that a unit or combination of units of general local government having a population of 50,000 or more shall be eligible to be a prime sponsor.

summary.text: Amends the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act to reduce from 100,000 the 50,000 the minimum population of local governments or combinations thereof which may be prime sponsors in the comprehensive manpower program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to provide that a unit or combination of units of general local government having a population of 50,000 or more shall be eligible to be a prime sponsor.
